metadata.title: CVE-2018-16743 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in mgetty before 1.2.1. In contrib/next-login/login.c, the command-line parameter username is passed unsanitized to strcpy(), which can cause a stack-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: mgetty package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-1').
